author: Staff Reporter
text:
An adult male tiger was found dead at Pazhamputhur village on Upper Kodaikanal hill near here on Wednesday.

Locals saw the carcass and alerted the forest officials who visited the spot and inspected the carcass.

They found the carcass on the road just 100 metres away from the village.

Meanwhile, villagers complained that a horse used to transport agri-produce from interior fields was found dead.

Wild animal attack

They suspected that the horse died due to wild animal attack. “We can find the cause of death only after post-mortem,” forest officials added.
title: Male tiger found dead in Kodaikanal
